prompts: Create a small, fire-type Pokemon that resembles a cute chick with bright orange feathers.
I want a design of a Pokemon that has an adorable round body and a fiery personality.
Generate a fiery bird Pokemon with vibrant colors and a playful expression.
Make a Pokemon that embodies warmth and joy, featuring a bright yellow beak and orange plumage.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to play in the grass, with a playful look and fiery wings.
Show me a cute little Pokemon with a fluffy body and bright orange colors, perfect for a starter.
Design a small, energetic bird Pokemon with orange feathers and a cheerful demeanor.
